content: @kennytm you have a crate for cargo-cov that handles coverage collection using profiling instrumentation generated by -Zprofile. Is the crate still actively maintained? I'm looking to make something that would transparently work with the new -Zinstrument-coverage flag, and it could be a modification/extension to cargo-cov I believe. (cc @Rich Kadel)
I'm fine with creating a new crate too, if you don't want to have anything else to do with cargo-cov anymore.
